bill.title: National Suicide Hotline Designation Act of 2019
bill.description: Requires the Federal Communications Commission to designate 9–8–8 as the universal telephone number for a national suicide prevention and mental-health crisis hotline.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
